column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Chicago pizza is a different beast than the New Haven style. It is deep dish. I had heard some about the deep dish crust being greasy
column2: but I didn't find that here. Actually
column3: this crust seemed rather dry to me. We also ordered one of their thin crust pizzas
column4: but don't even go there. It's neither Chicagoan nor anything else--the thin crust is just a sop to those who are afraid of carbo-overload.
